title: By the way, why isn't Lee Sin's R a skillshot ?
body:
I mean the targeting, why is it targeted? Make it a skillshot that shoots the closest target away. Similar to {{champion:150}} R, doesn't allow you to use it unless a target is in your range.

I mean it's not like it shoots minions right now or anything.. It might make it slightly harder to perform on the right target, but it makes its usage more convenient.

replies.body: You just posted EXACTLY HOW IT WORKS RIGHT NOW

On live it becomes a skillshot **after** you select a target.

Think of it as turning Dragon's Rage into a Vel'Koz W in terms of targeting.

Considering he's got an engage and an escape on two different spells... would it kill him?

I dunno, his ult's scaling and base damage is more concerning than the targeting, but then again it's not like he's uber OP considering half the playerbase can't even play him decently :/
